item.description:
We have a large social meetup twice each month. This gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Japanese or English, and enjoy dinner with a bunch of interesting people from around the Boston area and overseas.

Come on by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community!

We typically sit in the very back of the Prudential Food Court. To help recover the costs of this website, if possible please bring a $2 donation. We look forward to seeing you there!

Directions: http://www.prudentialcenter.com/gettinghere/index.php
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for us at the back of the Prudential Food Court, near Pizzeria Regina."
item.name: Prudential Social Meetup
